name: svg-edit
description: SVG-edit is a fast, web-based, javascript-driven SVG drawing editor that works in any modern browser.
author: Narendra Sisodiya <narendra@narendrasisodiya.com>, Pavol Rusnak <stick@gk2.sk>, Jeff Schiller <codedread@gmail.com>, Vidar Hokstad <vidar.hokstad@gmail.com>, Alexis Deveria <adeveria@gmail.com>
